entry.title: Vite report on Tue, 28 Nov 2023 20:01:57
entry.summary: In recent news, there have been several noteworthy events happening around the world. The Biden administration is focused on strengthening supply chains to the point where they are seamless and require no extra thought. Meanwhile, the US travel industry experienced its busiest Thanksgiving weekend ever, with surprisingly smooth operations. However, this record-breaking spending on Black Friday in America is said to be hiding a larger problem for the economy. Merriam-Webster announced its word of the year, which is described as "hard to define and subject to debate" and is somehow connected to Taylor Swift. In other news, a TikTok couple faced accusations of exploiting their children for content, denying claims that they made their kids produce 40 videos during a trip to Disney World. Additionally, there were reports of warning signs of sexual abuse at a youth center in Indiana, yet the state continued to send boys and funding to the facility. On a lighter note, a window cleaner who works on a 740-foot skyscraper shared their experience, initially feeling like they were going to die but eventually finding it freeing. These are just a few of the diverse stories making headlines in the world today.
